mapper.insert: insert into user(EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: select ifnull((select 1 from user where EMAIL=#{email} limit 1),0)
mapper.update: update user set NICKNAME=#{nickname}, set PHONE=#{phone}, set SEC_QUESTION=#{secQuestion}, set SEC_ANSWER=#{secAnswer}, set HEAD_URL=#{headUrl}, set MAJOR=#{major}, set AGE=#{age} where ID = #{id}
